title: Dominic Raab
deleted: In 2019, the [[International Court of Justice]] in [[The Hague]] ruled that the United Kingdom must transfer the [[Chagos Archipelago]] to [[Mauritius]] as they were [[Chagos Archipelago sovereignty dispute|not legally separated]] from the latter in 1965. In its statement rejecting the ruling, the Foreign Office said: "The United Kingdom has no doubt about its sovereignty over the Chagos Archipelago, which has been under continuous British sovereignty since 1814."<ref>{{cite news |title=Foreign Office quietly rejects International Court ruling to hand back Chagos Islands |url=https://inews.co.uk/news/politics/foreign-office-quietly-rejects-international-court-ruling-to-hand-back-chagos-islands-450078 |work=[[i (newspaper)|inews.co.uk]] |date=18 June 2020}}</ref>
